title: Introduction to JavaScript
content: Learn the basics of JavaScript syntax, variables, and data types. This lesson covers the fundamental concepts you need to start programming in JavaScript.

title: Functions and Scope
content: Understanding how to create and use functions in JavaScript. Learn about function declarations, expressions, arrow functions, and variable scope.

title: DOM Manipulation
content: Learn how to interact with HTML elements using JavaScript. This lesson covers selecting elements, modifying content, and handling events.
